items.label: 539f7181ec4f024411ece6df
items.description:
AVAILABILITY: To rural residences with less than 150 kVA transformer capacity where
usage is provided for domestic and farm use, and all service is provided through one meter.
TYPE OF SERVICE: A.C., 60 cycles, single-phase or three-phase at any of the District's
standard voltages.

Energy Charge = Purchased Power + Distribution Delivery

Single-Phase Service With Wheels-Only Irrigation
Where pivot wheels-only irrigation usage is measured through the single-phase farm and
rural residential meter, the rates for Single-Phase Service (Rate Code 01) above shall
apply. In addition, the Customer shall be billed an annual $310.00 horsepower charge in
the month of July.
items.name: FARM AND RURAL RESIDENTIAL Single Phase
